content.p: Find {{listing_prob}} using the listing method (sometimes called the set intersection method). You must show correct lists and a final answer.

outtro.p: The largest divisor appearing in both lists simultaneously is {{listing_gcd}}, so {{listing_prob}} = {{listing_gcd}}

content.p: Find {{factorization_prob}} using the prime factorization method. You must show your factorization(s) before giving the final answer.

outtro.p: Multiplying together all common factors gives us {{factorization_mult_gcd}}, so {{factorization_prob}} = {{factorization_gcd}}
